entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:54 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 06:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.3°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -27.2°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
